name: Linsanity Limited Edition "KOBE WHO? Fitted Tee $24
description:
Special Edition Limited: Only 100 will be printed. 


*****PICK- UP OPTION (No Shipping)*****

Enter the discount code"IWANTPICKUP" to have your shipping waived if you choose the pick up option.

For those of you in Vancouver, BC, Canada, this is the fastest and cheapest way of getting your tee.

Pick-up can be ready by the next business day!

Pick up location:
Marpole-oakridge area


******Shipping *******

For Canadian Customers Only
In order to make you an owner of these limited tees sooner, we decided to make the expedited delivery service a Standard. For the price of regular shipping, Canada post guarantees a 3-business day delivery from our official launch date (Feb 18th)


Male: Fitted (especially Shoulders and sleeves)
Female: Fitted female cutting

GARMENT MEASUREMENTS (Preshrunk)


Contact Info:
Anthony
theothersbrand@gmail.com

name: "Your Year" Screen Printed Hoodies
description: It may not be anything new by this time of the year, and the hype may already have died down, but that has always been what The Others have been about. Those who don't have the spot light life style but nevertheless have just as much drive and discipline to make something of themselves. Just like the tee, it's for you guys. The Others Brand stands for a collective of everyone out there that has supported us and stood together. With "The Others Co." on the back, wear this hoody with pride and make this year yours. It's about you. 100% Cotton Machine wash cold inside out with like colors Tumble dry low SMALL - SOLD OUT MEDIUM - SOLD OUT

name: "Your Year" Discharge Ink Tee
description:
It may not be anything new by this time of the year, and the hype may already have died down, but that has always been what The Others have been about. Those who don't have the spot light life style but nevertheless have just as much drive and discipline to make something of themselves. To honor you guys out there, we have produced this minimalistic tee, printed on good ol' American Apparel stock, simple and straight to the point. Make this year yours. It's about you.

100% Cotton
Machine wash cold 
inside out
with like colors
Tumble dry low

name: Scoop! x The Others 2nd Anniversary Graphic Tee
description:
Created in collaboration with local frozen yogurt store, "Scoop!", we brought back our most popular mascot from the launch line to commemorate Scoop!'s second straight year of success. Working in the magic number 2 anywhere we can, you will find hidden aspects within the graphic from the Chef's two fingers up to the two Scoop! logos on either side of the graphic. 

On Sale now!
Also available at Scoop! Frozen Yogurt store at 2050 W 4th Ave.
http://www.scoopyogurt.com

100% Cotton
Machine wash cold 
inside out
with like colors
Tumble dry low
